name: a game of cat and mouse
name_original: a game of cat and mouse
description:
He only listens to you, so do your best~

A short, cute game about giving your husband boss some documents.

  • Control Nihal by using the arrow keys to walk around and interact with things.
  • End the game by going near the chair in the last room, after talking to your passed-out husband on the ground.

Made with the amazing Bitsy engine that saved a newbie at games like me.

I hope you enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed making it!
